data.route_analysis: Guatemala is accessible via well-connected airports, with buses and shuttles for local travel. Considerations include safety and comfort.
data.seasonal_patterns: The best time to visit is between November and April, avoiding heavy rains and enjoying pleasant temperatures.
data.climate: Guatemala has a tropical climate, with dry seasons ideal for exploration. Expect temperatures ranging from 60°F to 80°F during peak travel months.
data.culture: Rich in Mayan heritage, Guatemala hosts numerous festivals, ancient traditions, and vibrant local markets.
data.attractions: Must-visit sites include Tikal, Antigua, and Lake Atitlán, showcasing nature and history.
